import React, { useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) },[dispatch, match]) const product = {} return ( <>

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out Of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
